haberman.rhizomatics.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • haberman.rhizomatics.data.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class extends SQLiteOpenHelper and allows data-driven map features creation. It acts as a buffer between a live data API (currently the hard-coded R.raw.rhizomatics) and the end-user interactions.
